description: Dashboard for Micrometer instrumented applications (Java, Spring Boot, Micronaut)

targets.expr:
sum by(repository, method, state) (
    increase(spring_data_repository_invocations_seconds_sum{job="$application-scrape", replication_instance=~"$replication_instance"}[$__range])
)
/ 
sum by(repository, method, state) (
    increase(spring_data_repository_invocations_seconds_count{job="$application-scrape", replication_instance=~"$replication_instance"}[$__range])
)

sum by(uri, outcome, method) (
    increase(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{job="$application-scrape", replication_instance=~"$replication_instance"}[$__range])
)
/ 
sum by(uri, outcome, method) (
    increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{job="$application-scrape", replication_instance=~"$replication_instance"}[$__range])
)

label_replace(
    sum by (method, uri, exception, status) (
        increase(
            http_server_requests_seconds_count{job="$application-scrape", replication_instance=~"$replication_instance", status=~"5..|400|499"}[$__range]
        )
    ) > 0, 
    'uri', 
    '$1/*$2', 
    'uri', 
    '(.*)\\/\\{.+\\}(.*)'
)

panels.title: Spring metrics - Database and HTTP Requests

title: Microservice REGARDS
